Song.title: Because You First Loved Me
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Doug Plank © 2009 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C F | Am G | C F | Am G]
Verse 1: [C] [ ]Love is patient, [F]love is kind [Am] [ ]Everywhere and [G]every time [C] [ ]It gives its [F]place in line [Am] [ ]to serve a[G]nother [C] [ ]But my heart it [F]struggles so [Am] [ ]I need Your [G]grace to grow [C] [ ]Lord, help me [F]give{,} and show [Am] [ ]this love to [G]others [F] [ ]Jesus, set me free [G] [ ]to love unselfishly
Chorus: [C] [ ]Because You [E7]first loved me [Am] [ ]I can [F]love [C]You with [E7]all my h[Am]eart [F] [C] [ ]Because You [E7]first loved me [Am] [ ]I’ll love [F]others [C]too, the [G]way You [Am]do [F] [C] [ ]I’ll [G]love them [Fmaj7]too
Verse 2: [C] [ ]When I love it [F]looks like this: [Am] [ ]It always [G]gives and gives [C] [ ]To God and [F]then it lives{,} [Am] [ ]to help my [G]neighbor [C] [ ]That’s a love I [F]haven’t got,{,} [Am] [ ]it’s me I [G]love a lot [C] [ ]Stuck here I’m [F]tied in knots,{,} [Am] [ ]I need a [G]Savior [F] [ ]Jesus, set me free{,} [G] to love You more than me
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 love is patient love is kind everywhere and every time it gives its place in line to serve another but my heart it struggles so i need your grace to grow lord help me give and show this love to others jesus set me free to love unselfishly chorus because you first loved me i can love you with all my heart because you first loved me ill love others too the way you do ill love them too verse 2 when i love it looks like this it always gives and gives to god and then it lives to help my neighbor thats a love i havent got its me i love a lot stuck here im tied in knots i need a savior jesus set me free to love you more than me
